item.title: How OLX Europe Fights Millions of Bots with AWS
item.description: My latest work done in OLX was featured by AWS on their own blog! I’m really happy with it. I talk about using AWS Firewall Manager + WAFv2 and in house tools to fight attacks. A big kudos to Gabril Soltz for his amazing work with the WAFBot. Read more at -> https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/architecture/field-notes-how-olx-europe-fights-millions-of-bots-with-aws/
